statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.uid , AA.name
, AA.RequestID , BB.Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.RequestID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestID = #RequestID#
AND AA.uid = #CategoryUid#
AND ( AA.name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsCategory ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, RequestID, uid, name ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #RequestID#, #uid#, #name# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsCategory SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, RequestID = #RequestID# , uid = #uid# , name = #name# WHERE ID = #ID#
